name: Falling Builder
description: Falling building - a game where you have to cost buildings. The falling block follows the mouse cursor. By pressing the S key or the DOWN ARROW the block will fall faster. You need to build a building according to the blueprint. Upon successful construction, coins will be given, for which it will be possible to buy a replacement block, which will be applied when pressing the SPACE key. Over time, more blocks will be created and they will fall faster.
